docs.abstract: Marilyn Stasio reviews crime novels The Wrong Side of Goodbye by Michael Connelly, Black Widow by Christopher Brookmyre, The Twenty-Three by Linwood Barclay and Precious and Grace by Alexander McCall Smith.

docs.snippet: An elderly Dane accused of being involved in the mass murder of Jews in Belarus during World War II will not be prosecuted, Danish authorities said Friday, saying they have "not found evidence he committed or took part in the killings."...
docs.lead_paragraph: An elderly Dane accused of being involved in the mass murder of Jews in Belarus during World War II will not be prosecuted, Danish authorities said Friday, saying they have "not found evidence he committed or took part in the killings."

docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column argues Republicans have been working to erode established democratic norms for decades in order to achieve goals like cutting taxes on rich and privatizing Medicare.
